Install Tensorflow and Python 3 on your computer.  
Then build an autoencoder (look at Keras - keras.io) to have 1 hidden layer (you figure out how many units) and to recreate the examples in the following table.  
Upload your python file with the results in comments.  
Provide comments we would need to understand anything non-standard and comments in general.
